/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly made of brick and concrete, their facades bathed in the warm glow of the sun. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. The street below is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, hinting at a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.
